Html:
Hello,

I'm trying to go in to RAWR and creating a new character that I have on Aleajecta Server. (Side note: When I try to grab my user from Aleajecta server & Region CN, it says it doesn't find my character). So when I tried to manually create my character which has all Burning Crusades items, since the server I'm on is only running Burning Crusades, I can't find anything. What do I need to do to get this to work for Burning Crusades and remove the Wraith King items?

 Thanks,

Mark

PS... I'm a Silverlight developer as well. I like where you guys are going with this. I find that the Silverlight version is more stable than the 2.2.13 version with what I have used of it, so far. Which is not much as you can see above.

I'm suspicious that CN armory loads won't work, since CN doesn't have the latest version of the Armory, I expect. Regardless, you're probably not finding any BC items, because there's a BC filter (see top right) that you need to turn. If there are any items that you don't find, you can add them (see readme/help docs). That said, Rawr's calculations are intended for level 80s, so you're probably going to find some oddness/inaccuracy.

Well this is a great idea. But it seems like it will be more work for me than not. I did turn on the BC filter and I'm still not seeing my items. If I can't filter out the WoTK, it will take forever to figure out what item is part of which version. This is very driven to WoTK, which I understand. Looks like this tool started being developed last year which is when WoTK is the latest and greatest thing. I just hope the server gets to WoTK sooner than later, I would really like to try this tool out.

Thanks for your time.

Mark

PS - If you guys need help with Silverlight let me know.

Heh, Rawr's been around since classic WoW. :)   Yeah, using it for BC theorycrafting right now would be quite difficult, and inaccurate.

We definitely welcome more help, but without being able to play WotLK, I fear your assistance would be pretty limited. :(
Aleajecta is a private server - Armory import only supports official WoW servers with the latest armory version
